tier.item: 1. a. n.i.vídy boky ho an'ny mpianatra ny mpampianatra.

`The teacher bought books for the student.'

tier.item: c. n.i.vidi.ana.n' ny mpampianatra boky ny mpianatra.
I would like to thank Randriamihamina Hasina, Rajaonarison Hery, Rasorofodrainibe Mamy, Razanajatovo Rado,
and Felantsoa Lovamanitra, in Madagascar and Noro Ramahatafandry in Los Angeles for providing the data for this
paper. Thanks also to Hilda Koopman, Dominique Sportiche, and Ed Keenan for comments and suggestions. All
Ntelitheos, Variation in the Distribution of Genitive Subjects in Malagasy
`The student was bought books for by the teacher.'
